metadata.title: CVE-2018-3615 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and Intelsoftware guard extensions (Intel SGX) may allow unauthorized disclosure ofinformation residing in the L1 data cache from an enclave to an attackerwith local user access via a side-channel analysis.

criterions.comment: linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
